.. _auto_colors:

***************************************************
Auto Colors (:mod:`~labreportpy.color.auto_colors`)
***************************************************

.. currentmodule:: labreportpy.color.auto_colors

This submodule contains functions to automatically change
foreground colors of text depending on the background
color of either the used colormap or the figure.


Reference/API
=============

.. automodapi:: labreportpy.color.auto_colors
    :inherited-members: Module
